data.eml:eml: First records of Epimeriidae and Iphimediidae (Crustacea, Amphipoda) from Macquarie Ridge, with description of a new species and its juveniles

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lörz, Anne-Nina (2012): First records of Epimeriidae and Iphimediidae (Crustacea, Amphipoda) from Macquarie Ridge, with description of a new species and its juveniles. Zootaxa 3200: 49-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214078
